name: UFO Fishing
description:
Can you get the crab to repair your mother ship?

Controls: Mouse + Keyboard

  • Control the UFO with mouse left and right
  • Fish deeper with mouse up and down
  • Use SPACE key to return your catch back to  the mothership
  • Buy upgrades to catch more fish in less time
  • Catch a crab and repair your mother ship to leaf this fishy world

Made by noskro & bitmedic for Mini Jam 91: UFO
